mapper.select: SELECT s.STORE_ID,s.STORE_NAME,a.AREA_NAME,s.ADDRESS,r.ROUTE_NAME,st.TYPE_NAME,s.`STATUS` FROM store s LEFT JOIN area a on s.AREA_ID=a.AREA_ID LEFT JOIN route r on s.ROUTE_ID=r.ROUTE_ID LEFT JOIN store_type st on s.SRORE_TYPE=st.TYPE_ID limit #{page}, #{size}

SELECT s.STORE_ID,s.STORE_NAME,a.AREA_NAME,s.ADDRESS,r.ROUTE_NAME,st.TYPE_NAME,s.`STATUS` FROM store s LEFT JOIN area a on s.AREA_ID=a.AREA_ID LEFT JOIN route r on s.ROUTE_ID=r.ROUTE_ID LEFT JOIN store_type st on s.SRORE_TYPE=st.TYPE_ID where s.STORE_ID=#{storeId}
